DOC.detailed_description: This RCT compare two dos zonisamide placebo one year . A total 225 subject randomly assign one three treatment intervention Duke University Medical Centre . The primary outcome measure change body weight kilogram . Secondary outcome include change waist circumference , glycaemic inflammatory marker , lipid , food craving , hunger satiety , quality life , blood pressure heart rate .
